Okay so, this was somewhat decent, The girls were good, the story was SHITTTTTTTTTT, I swear to God none of this fucking shit made sense. I SWEAR, seriously this is worst than TLOU 2 wayyyyyyyyyyy fucking worse. Okay so hear me out,
1.) The main character is a little kid? What is this pedophile shit.
2.) The Main character is a fucking pussy
3.) So the first two girls, fuck the shit out of him at first, they enjoy that shit, then they stop for like a week?
4.) The story catches up at the fivesome, i probably almost came there about four to five times. THEN ALL OF THAT WENT DOWN HILLLL
5.) So after the climax, they bring a new story, and no surprise the new story is the worst fucking shit imagineable
6.) I know the main character in the first story was a pussy, seriously the new MC is a FUCKING BITCHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH
7.)Fuck this shit

Omina is definitely top 10 when it comes to drawing beautiful women, i don't even mean just sex scenes, look at page 61 that's the definition of beauty. I had to stop reading for a second just to appreciate it.

but thankfully the 3 sisters and 1 maid really made up for it and I quite enjoyed it. Anyway on to the second part again the bareback scene at the end point of it really sold me and made me generally appreciate the story and direction more and made it a bit more enjoyable. all in all, I rate the first shota part 10/10 and the second MILF/daughter part 8/10, but we still have the last shota story to cover. Not a whole lot to say for the ending shota but that it ends on a strong note and leaves the reader satisfied with how it went since most of the time people like me have to make up our own endings and that leaves a bittersweet taste in the mouth but the authur greatfully didn't do that here and wanted to make this work a masterpiece and prime example of what shota should be, and I must say it has taken long for such an example for this shota generation to come out, all in all the last part of it is a 10/10 and the work as a whole is a 10/10.

The first part of this is excellent and what I came for, the straight up simple yet unique story is really what set it apart from others and made it enjoyable, I also liked the fact that there were 4 flavors of sisters to choose from 2 being quite energetic and upfront while the other most older sister was reserved and generally introverted yet by the midpoint was found to be in love with him and a total pervert, but again that was good. The art style for the entire stories the first and last 2 ones is the same and looks absolutely brilliant all the way from the shading and gradient work to the drawing style and that brings us to the second part. 

The second part is also very good and captivated me enough to read it after the shota which I came for *wink wink* was done, the story in my opinion for this was a bit cliche and overdrawn out but still it gets the job done, it has excellent BJ scenes from the MILF and her daughter which sadly wasn't really present in the shota that well,
This is god tier, haven't read such a long shotacon in a long long time, I'll be sure to give this one a proper review tomorrow as I am about to sleep and have no time on my hand.
@Gondar True. Good sex scenes with mother part, and somehow refreshing from all harem stuff.
